EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Website_USBankingReport2014_Q414.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: U.S. Banking and Financial Services Trends Report 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for your interest in the U.S. Banking and Financial Services Trends Report 2014 <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/US-Banking-and-Financial-Services-Mobile-Trends-Report-Pivotal-Labs.pdf> by Pivotal Labs.
Click here to access the report. <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/US-Banking-and-Financial-Services-Mobile-Trends-Report-Pivotal-Labs.pdf>
If you have any questions, reply to this email and we'll respond right away.
Sincerely, Imtiaz Jaffer, Director of Marketing Pivotal Labs
